document_data.name: Tanithil Eroth
document_data.mainbody: '''Tanithil Eroth''' was a [[moon elf]] elder of [[House Eroth]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Like his sister, [[Anaharae Eroth]], he was a skilled [[ranger]] and was rumoured to serve [[Amlaruil Moonflower|Queen Amlaruil Moonflower]].
